function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Historical pandemics recurring every 30 to 40 years","Impact":"Potential for regular outbreaks of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Investing in long-term public health infrastructure and disease monitoring","Technologies":"Advanced disease detection and monitoring systems","People":"General public, healthcare providers, policymakers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Impact of pandemics on the design of buildings and cities","Impact":"Influence on urban planning and infrastructure design","Mitigation":"Incorporating public health considerations into architectural and urban planning guidelines","Technologies":"Urban planning software, public health impact assessment tools","People":"Architects, urban planners, policymakers","Owner":"Architectural and urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Introduction of quarantine facilities and sanitation policies","Impact":"Prevention of disease spread and community health protection","Mitigation":"Implementing strict sanitation protocols and quarantine guidelines","Technologies":"Sanitation systems, quarantine management software","People":"Quarantine facility staff, public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility management"}]}
